alert.note: Alert for Central Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 8:42AM EST until February 17 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Snow accumulations between 2 to 4 inches, sleet accumulations around one third of an inch and ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Central Piscataquis County. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Expect slippery roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.
